content: Independent Living starts from $2000 a month. Assisted Living starts from $3000 a month. The community entrance fee is $3500.
Included in the monthly cost is Basic Cable, Internet/WiFi, Linen Service, Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Housekeeping.
Amenities include: Elevators, Party space, Exercise pool, Chef-prepared meals with seasonal ingredients, Outdoor seating, Housekeeping services, Beauty salon/services, Gym
Services provided: 24-hour staffing, Bathing assistance, Errand assistance, Medication management, Shopping assistance, Dressing assistance, Eating assistance
Cleaning services: Housekeeping, Linen services
Activities offered: Arts and crafts, Book clubs, Card playing, Cooking classes, Exercise programs, Game nights, Movie nights, Yoga
Dietary options available: Diabetic options, Low sugar/salt, Vegetarian, Gluten-free. Note: No information available about Kosher meal preparation.
Room amenities: Air conditioning, Microwaves, Private kitchenette, Walk-in shower, Furnished Rooms
Religious services: Devotional areas available
Dining areas: Dining room, In-room dining, Restaurant-style meal service
Outdoor activities: Accompanied walks, Park visits, Walking trails, Day trips
Outdoor areas: Courtyard, Garden, Outdoor areas suitable for walking
Fitness & exercise options: Gym or fitness room, Exercise pool, Yoga

The community does not accept long term care insurance. The community participates in HUD and Medicaid programs. Veterans may be eligible for Veterans benefits. Bridge loans are available for homeowners.
ACME Senior Living contact information: Phone: 850-445-8362, Address: 145 Fake Street, Charlotte, NC, 28203
Smoking policy: Outdoor smoking areas only
Care types offered: Independent Living, Assisted Living. We always have availability for all room types.
Room types available: 1 Bedroom / 1 Bath, 2 Bedroom / 1.5 Bath, Studios
Visiting hours: Guests at mealtimes, Flexible visiting hours, On-site parking for guests
Security measures: Staff background checks
Adult day care is not provided
Community capacity: 60 residents total
Gender policy: Men and women are not separated. Couples are allowed to live together.
Minimum age requirement: 60 years
Hospice is not provided. Respite care is provided.
Physical therapy is available through an onsite third-party provider. No information about speech therapy.
Transportation services: Scheduled local transportation, Transportation to medical appointments
Languages spoken: English and Spanish
Lease term: 12 months
Parking is available for residents. Residents are allowed to have cars.
Pets are allowed: Cats allowed, Small dogs allowed (under 25 lbs.), Service animals allowed, Fishes, Small birds
Skilled nursing is offered. Private aides are allowed in the community.
The community is vision impaired friendly and fully wheelchair accessible.
For careers and employment opportunities, visit: https://www.talkfurther.com/events-demo
Tour availability: Monday through Friday, 9am to 6pm
